personalInformation.about:
Dear Ma'am / Sir

Please accept my resume in response to your need to fill the available positions in your company. I believe that my educational backgrounds have sufficiently prepared me to manage all tasks associated with the position you are currently offering and that my skills would prove to be a benefit to your company. 

I believe that I can provide the analytical support needed . I am a goals- and detail-oriented individual with strong research skills and knowledge of business operations and trends.

I work as a Business Analyst Intern at Informatics Community Engagement Project(ICEP), my role / task was to manage a project (Project Manager) as I was a Scrum Master in charge of a team of 15 people.

I was responsible for effective communication and to make sure tasks are done on time, we used tools like product backlog and sprints to track our progress. We had daily stand up Scrum Meetings, and also used the Agile Methodology to work effectively. Trello was one of the other tools we use to communicate effectively and monitor tasks. I also did the testing of the software on a weekly basis as the Software Developers were developing it. 

I designed the prototype of the website and the developers designed the final product. 

I was in communication with clients on what they want and how it should be done. 

I am excited at the prospect of working for an industry leader and believe that I bring highly-developed skills that will prove valuable in continuing to move your company toward a bright and profitable future. I am available for an interview at your convenience to further discuss my qualifications and learn more about your expectations for this position.

Thank you for your consideration. I look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,
Thokamele Mahlati

information: I am a Web Developer intern at Umuzi, a leading organization that empowers young people with tech skills and opportunities. In this role, I not only develop web solutions using .NET Core, but also mentor and support the next generation of tech talent. Previously, I worked as a Software Developer at Wopl, a dynamic company that offers project-based contracts for diverse clients. There, I gained valuable experience in delivering high-quality software products, collaborating with other developers, and meeting deadlines and specifications. I have also studied Information Technology(Software development) at Nelson Mandela University, where I have honed my skills by building projects using various programming languages, such as JavaScript, Python, and C#. I have also earned multiple certifications from reputable platforms, such as Linkedln, HubSpot Academy, and freeCodeCamp, to enhance my knowledge and credentials. I am passionate about software development and eager to learn new technologies and trends. I enjoy working with others, sharing insights, and creating innovative solutions. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow and contribute to the tech industry. Let's connect and collaborate!

responsibilities.content:
I have experience developing a Learning Management System (LMS) utilizing REST API in JavaScript, employing Jasmine for testing, and building the frontend with React.js.
PostgreSQL was utilized as the backend database, ensuring efficient data management.
Docker was employed for containerization, facilitating seamless deployment and scalability.
Throughout the development process, Git served as the version control system, enabling collaborative development and tracking changes effectively.
Currently, I am engaged in React Native projects, leveraging TypeScript to enhance code maintainability, scalability, and type safety. This transition allows for the development of cross-platform mobile applications with improved reliability and performance.

At WOPL, I specialized in utilizing React.js and PHP Laravel framework for developing a delivery application.
React.js enabled the creation of dynamic and interactive user interfaces, while Laravel facilitated backend development, ensuring robustness and scalability.
Jasmine was employed for comprehensive testing, ensuring the reliability and quality of the application.
This combination of technologies resulted in the successful creation of a feature-rich delivery app, meeting the needs of both clients and end-users.

Implemented various image processing functions including greyscale conversion, edge detection, and cumulative energy mapping.

personalInformation.about:
I hold a BA degree majoring in Anthropology, Language and Communication in Society and
Psychology (University of the Western Cape) as well as an Anthropology Honours degree focused
on medical anthropology (University of the Western Cape). The pursuit of my Masters in
Philosophy on Trans-disciplinary health and Development (Stellenbosch University) is currently on
hold due to funding. Having had seven years of experience in social science public health research
spaces and interacting in these contexts and intersections, my driving factor has always been
where I can be of an instrumental tool in the environment of health research and beyond. As a
young black queer woman researcher in South Africa, existing in my own intersectionalities, where
I am both subject and conduit of knowledge.

personalInformation.about: Passionate about creating impactful user experience, I am a dedicated individual eager to embark on a career in UI/UX design. I am excited to apply my creativity and problem-solving abilities to the world.

Hey there!

I'm Silindile Kubheka, and let me tell you, the world of UI/UX design is like a playground for someone as obsessed with tech and design as I am. While I'm new to the field myself, my hunger to learn is bottomless. 

I might not have years of experience under my belt, but I make up for it with pure passion (and maybe a few late nights spent devouring YouTube tutorials on design principles).  What truly blows my mind is how UI/UX can completely transform how people interact with technology.  Imagine crafting interfaces that are not just stunning to look at, but also feel as smooth and intuitive as using your favorite app!

As a self-proclaimed tech enthusiast, the idea of contributing to this field by creating user-centered designs is incredibly exciting. I'm a fast learner who thrives on challenges, and I'm chomping at the bit to soak up knowledge, hone new skills, and collaborate on projects under the guidance of experienced mentors. 

Thank you for considering my application!  I'm confident that my fascination with AI and technology, coupled with my dedication and eagerness to learn, will make me a valuable asset to your UI/UX Learnership program.

Through the mechanism of a proxy vote, a member of a decision-making body possesses the capacity to exercise their voting privileges in the absence of their physical presence.
This is achieved by entrusting their voting authority to a designated substitute.
In a manner similar to an absentee ballot in the political realm, a proxy vote is employed for corporate matters rather than a traditional paper-based ballot.
Proxy holders dispatch these ballots to shareholders, who, upon returning the ballot, confer authorization upon the proxy holder to vote on specific agenda items in a predetermined manner.
Proxy voting primarily pertains to crucial decisions that bear the potential to significantly influence the future trajectory of a business or financial investment.
Thus, it affords individuals who cannot attend these meetings in person the opportunity to remain engaged and participate in the decision-making process.

I am Mdani Siwinile, a dedicated and innovative software developer with a passion for creating intuitive and impactful web solutions. Based in Cape Town, I hold a National Diploma in Information Technology, specializing in Software Development, from Walter Sisulu University.

With a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, Java, JavaScript, Python, and React.js, I combine technical expertise with a creative approach to problem-solving. Through academic coursework and hands-on projects, I have honed skills in front-end and back-end development, as well as UI/UX design using tools like Figma and Balsamiq

My commitment to continuous learning and staying abreast of industry trends positions me as a versatile and adaptable professional. I thrive in collaborative environments, leveraging strong communication skills to work effectively within multidisciplinary teams

Driven by a desire to make a meaningful impact, I am excited about leveraging technology to address real-world challenges and drive positive change. Whether it's developing user-friendly applications, optimizing code for performance, or exploring emerging technologies, I approach every project with enthusiasm and dedication

Outside of work, I enjoy writing books; I have a passion for writing to express how I feel. When not coding, you can find me exploring the latest advancements in web development or seeking inspiration from the world around me.
